page.title: 08Friday with Kirsty (2)
page.content: I don't take school meals; I take sandwiches so I am on second sittings. After I have eaten I play in the playground for a while. I play at skipping. During Friday lunchtimes I go to puzzle club where we do interesting problems with numbers. Afternoon school starts at 1.10p.m. We do topic work like History or Geography and then art after break.At a quarter to four we go home.I change into my playing clothes and watch television for a while before I have my tea.I don't eat much for tea on Friday because I go swimming that night at Tarleton Baths. When I come home I have a bath and get my hair washed to get rid of the chlorine. Then I watch televsion again. On Fridays my Mum and Dad let me stay up a bit later and I go to bed at about half past ten.(Kirsty Bowles)
